Part 107 Drone License¶

Note

This page is incomplete. Can you help contribute?

What is it?¶

The Part 107 license is required for any commercial activities involving drone piloting. In this case, Carnegie Mellon University counts as a commercial entity. You MUST obtain a Part 107 license in order to conduct field tests for the AirLab.

Process¶

TODO

Studying¶

Many members of the AirLab have used Tony’s guide on YouTube to successfully pass the Part 107 Test. It is less than two hours. We recommend setting up a “study party” with fellow AirLab members and some snacks.

A Part 107 study party featuring guacamole, fruit smoothie, oranges, and cheesecake.¶
